{{Quote|This fair maid is Chella, daughter of Cheyk, leader of the Black Ears.|[[Tyrion Lannister]]|The Pointy End}}
'''Cheyk''' is a character mentioned in the [[Season 1|first season]] episode "[[The Pointy End]]". He is a member of the [[Black Ears]], one of the [[hill tribes]] of the [[Mountains of the Moon]] in the [[Vale of Arryn]]. He's the father of [[Chella]], current leader of the Black Ears.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Cheyk, father of Chella, is a chieftain of the Black Ears.
